Html:
Hi All,

I've created an Addin for Word using RibbonUI.xml for the toolbar and buttons.
How can I disable a button e.g. after the user closed the Word doc?

Thanks.

regards,
Long
I think you should call invalidate on ribbonui, this will cause the callbacks to be invoked. If you've implemented a callback for GetEnabled, I think that shul do it

Ok, I will try it.
Thanks.
